name: SAFE BATTERY/PRODUCTS TRANSPORTATION COALITION
description: Coalition for the safe transportation of lithium-ion batteries.
sampleDescriptions: S. 1405/H.R.___, Federal Aviation Administration Reauthorization Act of 2017, issues relating to the safe transportation of lithium-ion batteries and products containing batteries.
